\n<Anzu>\."Good to see that Kurumada is become more then just

\n<Ranmaru>\."What are you doing so close to the exit?"
\n<Kurumada>\."Don't know about you, but I'm ready to leave."
\n<Kurumada>\."I guess I'll stay a bit longer then..."
\n<Anzu>\."Same... This place scares the hell out of me."
\n<Hinako>\."Kurumada! Get something to pry the bars...\.\. or anything!
\n<Alice>\."Do not worry! I will get help!"
\c[3]\.At that moment I saw him...\.\. Kurumada running away in
\c[3]\.He had no idea what to do.\. Who can blame him?
\c[3]\.If I was in the same spot as him, I would\!........
\c[3]\.I wouldn't be afraid to.\..\.\..\.\.\..\.\.\.\.leave everyone for dead.\^
\n<Dad>\."You fell asleep at the dinner table again..."
\n<Dad>\."Well that's good to hear, now just do me a quick favor\|
\n<Anzu>\."You aren't breathing properly! Please calm down!"
\n<Hinako>\."Can you get up? We need you for something."
\n<Hinako>\."We heard over a speaker in the TV that weve entered a
Game Room and now we have to do whatever they tell us
\n<???>\.\c[4]Is the TV not working? I swear they just got it fixed...
\n<???>\.\c[4]Well whatever visuals arent important in this game.
\n<???>\.\c[4]Lets get on with it.\.\. In front of you guys, you can see
a table right? That table is the \c[2]main objective of this
\n<???>\.\c[4]Notice what I did there? Thats how you say objective
in french. \.\.Ahahahaha... Im so cool. Anyways!
\n<???>\.\c[4]One of you has to lay down and attach all of the stuff
thats there, I couldnt care less to think of a name.
After that you gotta be ready for pressure cause\c[2]
whoevers on it is gonna face it...
\n<???>\.\c[4]After the trial starts there's a key somewhere in the
room, constantly moving. It's the job of the other 2 to
get that key and free the vict-... I mean..player...
\n<Ranmaru>\."What kind of half assed explanation is that?!"
\n<Ranmaru>\."Whats gonna happen to the person under pressure and
\n<???>\.\c[4]Geez you do ask a lot of questions.
\n<???>\.\c[4]Listen buddy, are you ready or not?
\n<Ranmaru>\."No, Im not ready! Im still registering that Im
\n<???>\.\c[4]Fantastic!\.\. Oh, and by the way, the names \c[2]Meister\c[4].
\n<Mesiter>\.\c[4]Dont call me strange man or slender or anything of the
\n<Hinako>\."Guess we gotta just go for it."
\n<Anzu>\."Do we really have to? Maybe theres another exit."
\n<Hinako>\."Talk to me when you're ready, Ranmaru."
\n<Ranmaru>\."What are you doing so close to the exit?"
\n<Kurumada>\."Don't know about you, but I'm ready to leave."

\n<Hinako>\."Kurumada! Get something to pry the bars...\.\. or anything!
\n<Alice>\."Do not worry! I will get help!"
